Module it.polimi.ingsw.gc42
Package it.polimi.ingsw.gc42.model.classes.cards

Class Card

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.gc42.model.classes.cards.Card
All Implemented Interfaces:
Observable
Direct Known Subclasses:
ObjectiveCard, PlayableCard
public class Card extends Object implements Observable
Implementation of Card for Model. A Card contains all the information necessary to create, represent and operate a Card. It's an Observable object, meaning that other objects can add a Listener to a Card to be notified when the Card gets flipped.

  • Constructor Details

    • Card

      public Card(boolean isFrontFacing, int id, String frontImage, String backImage)
      Constructor Method
      Parameters:
      isFrontFacing - : true if the Card is showing the front Side, false if it is showing the back Side
      id - : unique identifier for the specific Card
      frontImage - : String containing the name (+ extension) of the Image resource to display on the GUI
      backImage - : String containing the name (+ extension) of the Image resource to display on the GUI

      public javafx.scene.image.Image getShowingImage()
      Getter Method for frontImage and backImage.
      Returns:
      the appropriate Image resource to display on the GUI, based on which Side is shown.

    • flip

      public void flip()
      Flips the Card, changing which Side it is showing. Inverts the value inside isFrontFacing.

    • setListener

      public void setListener(Listener listener)
      Method from the Observable interface. Adds listener to the ArrayList of Listener objects who are subscribed to the Card.
      Specified by:
      setListener in interface Observable
      Parameters:
      listener - : object containing the lambda function to execute once the Card gets flipped.

    • removeListener

      public void removeListener(Listener listener)
      Method from the Observable interface. Removes listener from the ArrayList of Listener objects, so that it doesn't get notified of its status anymore.
      Specified by:
      removeListener in interface Observable
      Parameters:
      listener - : object containing the lambda function to execute once the Card gets flipped.

    • notifyListeners

      public void notifyListeners(String context)
      Method from the Observable interface. For each Listener inside the ArrayList, it calls the onEvent() method that runs the lambda contained in them.
      Specified by:
      notifyListeners in interface Observable
